attributes.action: create a safe crossing for motor vehicles on the A548 coast road by petrolheads cafe
attributes.additional_details:
Please help make the A548 coast road in Bagillt safer to cross, theres a central crossing that goes from the petrol station by petrolheads cafe(CH6 6HJ) across to the Lyons den gym. Theres at least 2 crashes a month happening jue to people trying to cross or join the 50mph road.
A round about or traffic lights would prevent further crashes.
